nodes.text: Fodu, or Fogu, was a foodstuff served with green fire sauce in Melahnese cuisine.

This food was mentioned with both of the above spellings in Death Star. It is unclear which is the primary spelling, however, Fodu appears first. Alternatively, Teela may have been bluffing when discussing her cooking ability with Villian Dance and had no idea what type of food Fodu was, let alone how to cook or pronounce it.
